pkgmetadata.longdescription: Extended Mixed Models Using Latent Classes and Latent Processes // Estimation of various extensions of the mixed models including latent class mixed models, joint latent class mixed models, mixed models for curvilinear outcomes, mixed models for multivariate longitudinal outcomes using a maximum likelihood estimation method (Proust-Lima, Philipps, Liquet (2017) doi:10.18637/jss.v078.i02).
